value.title: StarCraft 2: AMAZING - Dark did NOT expect this from Classic!
value.excerpt: Best-of-3 series of top level StarCraft 2 from the GSL Code S in South Korea. This series between Classic and Dark is not the Protoss versus Zerg I expected it to be. Loads of cheese and aggressive build orders to try and catch the opponent off guard. Minor mistakes that lead to major results. Support
